sent.orig: The role selection elements involved operation, social contact and team-forming, role's ability functions and role's appearances.
sent.trans: 角色考量因素有操作使用、社交组队、角色能力功能与角色外观四个。

sent.orig: When the leading role process is an extraverted one, the supporting role process is introverted.
sent.trans: 当主导功能外倾时，对应的辅助功能是内倾的。

sent.orig: Gas pipelines have a single role of booster pumps and pump dual role.
sent.trans: 气体管道增压泵有单作用水泵和双作用水泵。

sent.orig: Because the owner role is calculated when an object is created, the owner role is special.
sent.trans: 因为当一个对象被创建时，专门形成了所有者这个角色，它是特殊的(special)。

sent.orig: Cases: Prepare your role in Barrister and Avocat, and your role The Yearly Review.
sent.trans: 个案：请准备在下周雇用／薪水个案及绩效评估（年度检讨）个案中所欲扮演的角色。
